Text:
love the fact you guys always upload tv shows so quickly, however for the most of us, they are useless as they are all rar files and too much trouble to unzip top throw on a usb and watch on tv....

can you consider ups that are normal format that can be put straight onto a usb then watched on tv, no fromatting required???
RAR files take hardly anytime to put together, much faster than waiting for someone else to upload it in another form.
maybe quick to download, but is there a fast way to convert so as to put on a usb so i can watch on tv???
it iquick to download, but no faster than any  other format....is there a way to convert rar to watch on tv via usb stick, rather than just unzipping and then watching on laptop???
